name: MapTiler Planet
description: MapTiler Planet is a tileset containing general layers with topographic information, built to use as a general context of a map for daily life. It combines data from OpenStreetMap and many other sources, including verified glacier data from NASA, for a comprehensive, quality-controlled, global dataset. It features over a billion buildings, high coverage in specific regions, and is suitable for 3D visualization, tracking assets, and accurate mapping.
